message: Word training with - Fabian Kurz, DJ1YFK - qrq program... links above show some screenshots from his program.  Qrq, supports sending random words in addition to just call signs.  Also, by hitting F6, and/or the pageup/pagedown key you can repeat the last sent word as many times as needed with F6, and/or even change the speed + or -  on the fly with the pageup or pagedown key
The raised cosine waveform is considered to be the best waveform for qrq cw:  http://qrqcw.files.wordpress.com/2008/09/hanning.jpg
